questions.question: How can false minima be reduced in case of error in recall in feedback neural networks?

answers.c: can be either probabilistic update or using additional units

questions.question: What is the objective of a pattern storage task in a network?

answers.a: to store a given set of patterns
answers.b: to recall a give set of patterns

questions.question: What property should a feedback network have, to make it useful for storing information?
